title: Religious Pluralism vs  Perennialism
description:
My good friend Luke Thompson had these thoughts after hearing some dissatisfaction with Paul Kingsnorth's Rebel Wisdom interview.  We had to postpone our Apocalypse of John conversation (look for it on Thursday) and he agreed to let me share.  

Luke's Channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_dnk5D4tFCRYCrKIcQlcfw
